content: Setting focus can depend on the UI library. In material-ui, this link notes a way to do it programatically. However, it uses refs, which don’t work with functional components. (See React docs here.) One option would be to change the SearchBox to regular class based component. There are probably other ideas too, but setting focus at the right time is a little separate from animations. (Though I understand for a production app you might want to resolve this.)
